price: ߞߵߊߟߊ߫ ߕߏ߫ ( ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߞߏߛߐ߲߬ )، ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߦߴߊߟߎ߫ ߘߍ߬ߡߍ߲߬ ߠߊ߫ ߓߊ߬؟ ߥߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߟߊ߬ߥߛߊ߫ ߛߐ߬ߘߐ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߖߘߍ߬ ߦߋ߫؟
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلۡ يَنصُرُونَكُمۡ أَوۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi hal yanṣurūnakum aw yantaṣirūna
